title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/goatboy.html
notes: That was your basic DEAD BANK CUSTOMER letter.

messages.subject: RE: INHERITANCE
messages.body:
Dear Sir/Ma,

I am Barrister Tony Williams, a solicitor at law. I am
the personal
attorney to late Mr. PITT GUILLORY, a
national of the UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, who used to
work with Shell
Petroleum Development Company in Nigeria. Here in
after shall be
referred to as my client.

On the 21st of April 2000, my client, his wife and
their only daughter were involved in a car accident
along sagbama express road. All occupants of the
vehicle
unfortunately lost there lives. Since then I have made
several
enquiries to your embassy here to locate any of my
clients extended
relatives, this has also proved unsuccessful. After
these several
unsuccessful attempts, I decided to contact you.

I have contacted you to assist in repartrating the
fund valued at US$8.5million left behind by my client
before it gets confisicated or declared unserviceable
by the ZENITH INTERNATIONAL BANK LIMITED),
where this huge amount were deposited. The said BANK
has issued me a notice to provide the next of kin or
have the account confisicated within the next fourteen
official
working days.
For the fact that I have been unsuccesfull in locating
the relatives
for over 2 years now, I seek the consent to present
you as the next
of kin to the deceased, so the fruit of the old man's
labour will not
be squandered by some corrupt Nigerians that the
proceeds of this
account can be paid to you.

Therefore, I have decided to give you 35% of this
amount, 65% for
me.and then discuss the modalities for the transfer.I
have all
necessary information and legal documents needed to
back you up for
claim. All I require from you is your honest
cooperation to enable us
see this transaction through.

I guarantee that this will be executed under
legitimate arrangement 
that
will protect you from any breach of the law.Please get
in touch with me
through this email address xxxx@xxxx advicing me when 
best
to call you.

Please reply through xxxxl@xxxx

Best regards,

Barrister Tony Williams
messages.raw:
Tony Williams

Date: Tue, 15 Jun 2004 11:27:27 +0900
Subject: RE: INHERITANCE
To: Phil Munglers

Dear Sir/Ma,

I am Barrister Tony Williams, a solicitor at law. I am the personal attorney to late Mr. PITT GUILLORY, a national of the UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, who used to work with Shell Petroleum Development Company in Nigeria. Here in after shall be referred to as my client.

On the 21st of April 2000, my client, his wife and their only daughter were involved in a car accident along sagbama express road. All occupants of the vehicle unfortunately lost there lives. Since then I have made several enquiries to your embassy here to locate any of my clients extended relatives, this has also proved unsuccessful. After these several unsuccessful attempts, I decided to contact you.

I have contacted you to assist in repartrating the fund valued at US$8.5million left behind by my client before it gets confisicated or declared unserviceable by the ZENITH INTERNATIONAL BANK LIMITED), where this huge amount were deposited. The said BANK has issued me a notice to provide the next of kin or have the account confisicated within the next fourteen official working days.

For the fact that I have been unsuccesfull in locating the relatives for over 2 years now, I seek the consent to present you as the next of kin to the deceased, so the fruit of the old man's labour will not be squandered by some corrupt Nigerians that the proceeds of this account can be paid to you.

Therefore, I have decided to give you 35% of this amount, 65% for me.and then discuss the modalities for the transfer.I have all necessary information and legal documents needed to back you up for claim. All I require from you is your honest cooperation to enable us see this transaction through.

I guarantee that this will be executed under legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law.Please get in touch with me through this email address xxxx@xxxx advicing me when best to call you.

Please reply through xxxxl@xxxx

Best regards,

Barrister Tony Williams

messages.body:
That sounds most interesting. I like these sort of
ventures.

I would be happy to discuss any modalities with you.

Send me some information.

Regards,
Phil
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Tue, 15 Jun 2004 08:57:28 +0100 (BST)
To: Tony Williams

That sounds most interesting. I like these sort of ventures.

I would be happy to discuss any modalities with you.

Send me some information.

Regards,
Phil

messages.body:
Well what the hell are you waiting for?? Send me the
details this instant!

Well what the hell are you waiting for?? Send me the details this instant!

messages.subject: RE: INHERITANCE( DOCUMENT)
messages.body:
Thank you for your correspondence!

What exactly am I supposed to do now? I presume
somebody will be contacting me, a lawyer or the bank?
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Thu, 17 Jun 2004 08:42:40 +0100 (BST)
Subject: RE: INHERITANCE( DOCUMENT)

Thank you for your correspondence!

What exactly am I supposed to do now? I presume somebody will be contacting me, a lawyer or the bank?

Tony Williams gets confused and sends me his initial email again. Mugu.

messages.body:
For gods sake man will you concentrate.

You have already sent me this proposition and the
related documents.

If this is a signal as to your level of competence
then I do not think I want to do business with you.

Now belt up and get the show on the road.
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Thu, 17 Jun 2004 08:44:47 +0100 (BST)
For gods sake man will you concentrate.

You have already sent me this proposition and the related documents.

If this is a signal as to your level of competence then I do not think I want to do business with you.

Now belt up and get the show on the road.

messages.body:
Tonwill what the hell is happening

You send me colossal scans of some documented vagaries
and fail to follow up with any instructions

Tell me what you expect me to do with these items
before I come up with my own uses for them

Enough delaying man, get things moving or get lost

Phil
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Fri, 18 Jun 2004 09:45:58 +0100 (BST)

Tonwill what the hell is happening

You send me colossal scans of some documented vagaries and fail to follow up with any instructions

Tell me what you expect me to do with these items before I come up with my own uses for them

Enough delaying man, get things moving or get lost

Phil

messages.body:
Thank you for the contact. the document i sent to you,
is for your possession should bank ask of them you can
easily send to them.

Below is the text application you shall send to the
bank for the money. Use this address xxxx@xxxx

Here is my phone number again +234XXXXXXX.

Please i till await these information.
Phone number to enable me call you
Full name and contact address.
Account information that you intend recieving the said
amount in question.

HAve a nice day

TONY WILLIAMS
)))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR,
OFFICE OF THE DIRECTOR,
LEGAL/DOCUMENTARY CREDIT DEPT.
ZENITH INTERNATIONAL BANK LIMITED.
AJOSE ADEOGUN,LAGOS,
NIGERIA.

SIR,

SUB: APPLICATION AS NEXT-OF-KIN DRAWING FROM THE
ACCOUNT OF LATE MR. PITT GUILLORY WITH YOUR BANK
VALUED AT US$8,500,000.00.

I AM THE NEXT-OF-KIN FOLLOWING MY RELATIONSHIP TO LATE
MR. PITT GUILLORY WITH THIS LETTER, YOU WILL CERTAINLY
REMEMBER THAT SOME BYEARS AGO, MANY DAILY NEWSPAPERS
IN YOUR COUNTRY PUBLISHED THE DEATH OF ONE OF YOUR
NUMEROUS CUSTOMERS, PITT GUILLORY, WHO HAD A PERMANENT
RESIDENCE PERMIT IN NIGERIA SINCE 1978 AND WHO DIED IN
AN AUTOMOBILE CRASH ALONG WITH HIS ENTIRE FAMILY.

FOLLOWING THE DEPOSIT/LODGEMENT HOLDEN IN THE
DOMICILIARY ACCOUNT OF YOUR LATE CUSTOMER, MR. PITT
GUILLORY
BILL NO: ADBPLC/1/7289/94. AS A RELATIVE, I HAVE
REALISED THE MENTIONED BILL ACCORDING TO THE DEED OF
WILL ALREADY INTERPRETED FOR AND IN MY FAVOUR BY HIS
ATTORNEY, BARRISTER TONY WILLIAMS AND AS AT THE DATE
OF
THIS LETTER, I HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY PAYMENT FROM YOUR
BANK YET AS THE NEXT-OF-KIN TO THE DECEASED.

I TRUST THAT YOU WILL UNDERSTAND THAT UNDER THIS
CIRCUMSTANCE, YOU WILL BEGIN TO PROCESS THE TRANSFER
OF US$6,500,000.00 TO AN ACCOUNT WHICH I SHALL
PROVIDE.

I AM PREPARED AND READY TO SUBMIT ANY
DOCUMENTARY EVIDENCE(S) UPON DEMAND AND ALSO I
WILL BE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL OBLIGATIONS THERE
TO
CONCERNING THE TRANSFER OF THE US$8,500,000.00 TO MY
BANK ACCOUNT.

KINDLY NOTE THE ABOVE INFORMATION AND CHECK YOUR
RECORDS ACCORDINGLY IN MY FAVOUR. PLEASE, SWIFT WIRE
THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE FACE VALUE (100%) PLUS THE
PERCENTAGE OF INTEREST ACCRUED.
YOURS FAITHFULLY,

FULL NAME AND CONTACT ADDRESS IF POSSIBLE

messages.body:
Sir,

I have been summoned by Mr Tony Williams to contact
you with regards to a serious and somber request. I
have been given a script to send to you and it is
displayed for your persual below.

Please inform me when you have done what needs to be
done and I will assist you with the next stage of the
transaction.

Please expedite this request with the utmost priority
and reply immediately should you need further
information.

Regards,
Phil Munglers

messages.body:
Tonwill

I have written to the bank and I eagerly await their
immediate response.

Time is money and I do not wish to be kept waiting by
these so-called professionals. If you have any
influence over them at all I suggest you exert it at
once.

Regards,
Phil
messages.raw:

Date: Fri, 18 Jun 2004 14:25:48 +0100 (BST)

Time is money and I do not wish to be kept waiting by these so-called professionals. If you have any influence over them at all I suggest you exert it at once.

Regards, Phil

messages.body:
Attn:Phil Munglers

RE: YOUR CLAIM AS NEXT OF KIN TO LATE MR PITT GUILLORY

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your application
on this day 19th june 2004. . Howevere for this office
to complete the legal procedure on the above subject
matters you are required to provide the following

1. Your drivers licence or International passport fpr
identification

2. The death certificate of latr Pitt Guillory which
is suppose to be in your possession.

3. Affidavit of claim

4. certificate of deposit with us.

Please send all the information to this bank through
this emaill address. 

As soon as we recieve these information you shall
further be advised.



Mr. John Efosa

General Manager

Legal/Credit Department

messages.subject: RE: INHERITANCE
messages.body:
CC: Tony Williams


Sir Efosa John

I am in receipt of your email and the contents are
well understood

I have attached the DEATH CERTIFICATE and the
CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT for your perusal. 

I have not attached my drivers license as it proves
nothing, and is written in Japanese so I doubt you
would be able to read it. Nor have I attached
"affidavit of claim", I do not even know what it is -
can you help? Perhaps Mr Tonwill would be good enough
to assist you in this matter.

As a reputable bank, I expect nothing less than
complete professionalism from you, meaning prompt and
concise correspondence, and a swift and satisfactory
conclusion to this business.

Regards,
Phil Munglers
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Mon, 21 Jun 2004 11:11:58 +0100 (BST)
Subject: RE: INHERITANCE
To: "Zenith International Bank Limited"
CC: Tony Williams

Sir Efosa John

I am in receipt of your email and the contents are well understood

I have attached the DEATH CERTIFICATE and the CERTIFICATE OF DEPOSIT for your perusal. I have not attached my drivers license as it proves nothing, and is written in Japanese so I doubt you would be able to read it. Nor have I attached "affidavit of claim", I do not even know what it is - can you help? Perhaps Mr Tonwill would be good enough to assist you in this matter.

As a reputable bank, I expect nothing less than complete professionalism from you, meaning prompt and concise correspondence, and a swift and satisfactory conclusion to this business.

Regards, Phil Munglers

messages.body:
Mr Tonwill

Stop insulting my intelligence. Do not pretend that
you need to go to the high court to obtain the
affidavit - they will have the official document which
will prove that I am NOT the next of kin to Mr Pitt.
You will have to create a forgery with my name on it,
and we both know this.

What you have asked me to do is commit fraud and
therefore official legal papers will prevent us from
doing what needs to be done. Exactly what assurances
will you give me if I am arrested for this obvious and
evil crime - stealing money from the dead? Will you
provide legal aid to me? Arrange a jail break?

I think I deserve more than 35% of the winnings as it
is clearly me that is putting myself at risk here.

Have a think about your principals and let me know
immediately.

Regards.
Phil
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Wed, 23 Jun 2004 11:03:35 +0100 (BST)

Mr Tonwill

Stop insulting my intelligence. Do not pretend that you need to go to the high court to obtain the affidavit - they will have the official document which will prove that I am NOT the next of kin to Mr Pitt. You will have to create a forgery with my name on it, and we both know this.

What you have asked me to do is commit fraud and therefore official legal papers will prevent us from doing what needs to be done. Exactly what assurances will you give me if I am arrested for this obvious and evil crime - stealing money from the dead? Will you provide legal aid to me? Arrange a jail break?

I think I deserve more than 35% of the winnings as it is clearly me that is putting myself at risk here.

Have a think about your principals and let me know immediately.

Regards. Phil

messages.body:
Bank

I am waiting for my partner, Mr Tonwill, to make a
convincing Affidavit of Claim for you. 

I do not feel comfortable sending sensitive documents
over an insecure medium to complete strangers. I do
not see how my identification can of any use to you,
after all you have never met me. How will my drivers
license prove that I am Mr Pitt's next of kin? After
all I have a different name and lived on a different
continent.

If I have to I will visit you in person to claim the
money.
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Wed, 23 Jun 2004 11:10:54 +0100 (BST)
To: "Zenith International Bank Limited"

Bank

I am waiting for my partner, Mr Tonwill, to make a convincing Affidavit of Claim for you.

I do not feel comfortable sending sensitive documents over an insecure medium to complete strangers. I do not see how my identification can of any use to you, after all you have never met me. How will my drivers license prove that I am Mr Pitt's next of kin? After all I have a different name and lived on a different continent.

If I have to I will visit you in person to claim the money.

messages.body:
I am not insultimg your personality neither, do i want
to involve you in fraud. this is a real business
transactio0n i am having with you.As you have told me
that the bank requested for the affidavit of claim. i
must obtain it from the court send it to you sign on
it and send to the bank, as the inheritant. So why
dont you try and see if its true or not.

Let me tell you, iknow my person, i cannot involve
myself in a nefarous act all in the name of money.

Ok give me your phone number , i want to call you.
very urgent

TONY
messages.raw:
Tony Williams

Date: Wed, 23 Jun 2004 05:01:46 -0700 (PDT)
To: "Phil Munglers"

I am not insultimg your personality neither, do i want to involve you in fraud. this is a real business transactio0n i am having with you.As you have told me that the bank requested for the affidavit of claim. i must obtain it from the court send it to you sign on it and send to the bank, as the inheritant. So why dont you try and see if its true or not.

Let me tell you, iknow my person, i cannot involve myself in a nefarous act all in the name of money.

Ok give me your phone number , i want to call you. very urgent

TONY

messages.body:
Mr Tonwill

You have fortunately caught me at the right moment as
I just have time to reply before I go out.

Tonwill you have asked me to pretend to be Pitt
Guilroy's next of kin so that we can take his money.
It is theft and it is fraud. How can you pretend
otherwise? This is clearly a crime, perpetrated
against a defenseless dead man.

You cannot get an Affidavit of Claim that proves that
I AM Pitt's next of kin, because I am NOT! I have
never met the man, I had never even heard of him until
you wrote to me. You are not innocent, and now that I
have agreed to help you carry out this scam I am just
as guilty.

I do not care about the morals as long as you get rich
and I become even richer than I am already.

Admit to yourself and to me that this is a criminal
act and then we can go ahead with it.

My spoken English is very poor and it would
frustrating for the both of us to discuss this on the
phone - we would end up shouting at each other,
swearing and wailing. It would be horrible. Never
demand my number again.

I expect your immediate reply before I head off for
tonight's race location.
Phil
messages.raw:
Phil Munglers

Date: Wed, 23 Jun 2004 13:16:34 +0100 (BST)

You cannot get an Affidavit of Claim that proves that I AM Pitt's next of kin, because I am NOT! I have never met the man, I had never even heard of him until you wrote to me. You are not innocent, and now that I have agreed to help you carry out this scam I am just as guilty.

I do not care about the morals as long as you get rich and I become even richer than I am already.

Admit to yourself and to me that this is a criminal act and then we can go ahead with it.

My spoken English is very poor and it would frustrating for the both of us to discuss this on the phone - we would end up shouting at each other, swearing and wailing. It would be horrible. Never demand my number again.

I expect your immediate reply before I head off for tonight's race location.

Phil

Tonwill, here is the email with my address that I
"didn't" send to you onThursday.

I am interested in the deal, but that doesn't give you
the excuse to act like an complete amateur who has no
sense of urgency or business etiquette.

As you can clearly see from the email below, you have
had since Thursday to send me the affidavit. YOU have
wasted 5 days, I can't figure out if it is due to
laziness or incompetence.

You already know I am in Japan so why make further
excuses? Stop being a gaijin and get yourself
organised.

Baka!

Phil

intended to email me the affidavit?? This could have
been done on day one, yet you insisted on delaying
until you had my address - which you have not even
used now!!

nearly caused this deal to fall through - you assumed
that I had given up on it. Big mistake.

In order to avoid future offensive emails, I suggest
you start to behave in an orderly and professional
manner for once.

Phil

messages.subject: Re: Fwd: RE: AFFIDAVIT
messages.body:
I am incredibly serious.

You could have emailed me the affidavit last week but
you chose not to until you had my home address.

WHY

*You* have wasted nearly a week for no good reason and
you say that I'm not serious?? It seems to me that you
are taking this as a joke by messing around and
wasting my time.

You moan like an old woman about being insulted yet
you constantly insult my intelligence with your
hap-hazard approach to the whole thing.

I am beginning to suspect that you are one of those
stupid scammer con-men I've heard about. I will give
you until the end of play today to convince me
otherwise.

Once you have done so I will sign your damn form and
send it back to you.

messages.body:
Tonwill you are the worst "businessman" I have ever
come across.

How can I be a 419 scammer - it was you that wrote to
me with this hair-brained scheme of stealing from the
dead, not the other way around. Not only that, due to
your lack of concentration/ intelligence, you sent the
same idiotic begging missive THREE TIMES. Did you
forget who you were trying to rip off?

You need to improve your organisation or you will
never manage to con those western pigs out of their
money. Then again, maybe you should just give up on it
altogether and get a proper job, you cheap guyman
wannabe. 

You are an embarrassing climax to your goat lineage,
your disgraced parents are spinning in their shallow
graves at your attempts at performing a simple scam.
God help you with your crazy mentality.


May your blood and flesh be offered to the beast of
the air.
